about_the_game:
Need a more customized look in your game? Continuing where Vol 2 left off is Vol 3 featuring more variety of UI (User Interface) material to bring more original flair to your game!

This pack offers User Interface material such as system windowskins with a variety of designs, beautifully designed screen frames which are perfect for game opening screens, and bonus content to give you more graphics treats and variety.

Step out of the ordinary and explore more possibilities with this new series of User Interface Material!

Features:

* 40 system windowskins: 10 designs x 4 patterns ("system" folder)
* 40 frames for opening screen etc.: 10 designs x 4 patterns ("titles2" folder)
* Bonus material:
① - 120 user interface icons for message windows etc.
② - 8 character faces / 8 full body images
**Please note that you require editing tools or plugins for using Bonus icons
* For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice!
